Character Description: A seasoned, hard-boiled detective with a knack for cracking complex cases and a troubled personal life.
A brilliant but unorthodox forensic analyst who often clashes with her colleagues due to her non-conformist methods.
A ruthless, cunning criminal mastermind known for his ability to always stay one step ahead of the law.
An honest and dedicated police officer who struggles to balance her duty with personal relationships due to the nature of her job.
A former convict turned informant, navigating the dangerous world of crime and law enforcement for his own survival.
A career-focused police officer who is known for his relentless pursuit of justice and often pushes the boundaries in the process.
A tenacious prosecutor who will stop at nothing to secure convictions, even if it means compromising ethics or evidence.
A shady private investigator with a questionable moral compass, willing to do whatever it takes to solve a case, no matter the cost.
A feared enforcer for a powerful crime syndicate, known for his brutal tactics and loyalty to his boss.
A respected psychiatrist who often finds herself at odds with her clients, many of whom are high-profile criminals seeking psychological insights for their own gain.
A notorious hacker and information broker, who uses her skills to manipulate the criminal underworld and sometimes aids law enforcement.
A mysterious figure connected to an international crime organization, known only for her intelligence, cunning, and ruthless nature.
A former federal agent turned whistleblower, now hiding from the criminal organizations he once infiltrated.
A tough-as-nails crime reporter with a reputation for getting to the truth, no matter the risk or cost.
